info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Northampton, southeastern Greensville and southwestern Southampton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Claresville, or near Dahlia, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Northampton, southeastern Greensville and southwestern Southampton Counties, including the following locations... Severn, Margarettsville, Branchville, Bryants Corner, Little Texas, Galatia and Falsons Old Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
